text: Ara kono stri yadi tara sbamira durbyabahara kimba upeksara asanka kare tabe tara aposa-nispatti karate ca'ile tadera kono gonaha ne'i ebam aposa-nispatti'i sreya. Manusera antarasamuhe lobhajanita krpanata bidyamana. Ara yadi tomara satkarmaparayana ha'o o muttaki ha'o, tabe tomara ya kara allaha to tara khabara rakhena
